programme.title: Paul O'Grady's 100 Years of Movie Musicals
programme.desc: Paul explores the history of the genre, from its roots in the early 20th century, through its golden era, and up to the multimillion-dollar industry it has become. Featuring contributions from James Corden, Michael Ball, Michael York, Joel Grey, Sheila Hancock, Benny Andersson and Scott Baio, and the directors and stars of Les Miserables discuss singing the whole score live on set.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Tree surgeon Kevin, 57, arrives at King's College Hospital in London with breathing difficulties, having fallen off a ladder onto a metal bar, while 11-year-old Archie has cut his lip in an accident at school and is worried about stitches. Elsewhere, a drink-related fall has left 53-year-old John with a head injury, and barman Ross, 31, needs treatment for a fractured eye socket following an alcohol-fuelled night out.

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Chef Jamie Oliver demonstrates how to prepare two more quick recipes, beginning with sausage gnocchi, warm kale and bean salad, followed by Mexican chicken, wicked mole sauce and vegetables and rice.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps Bedfordshire couple Liz and Grahame Pink, who have saved hard for their dream holiday home in Lanzarote and have a budget of £63,000 to spend on a property.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Mother and daughter Sue and Stacey Jones, who have a budget of £72,000, search for a holiday home that will also generate a rental income on Spain's Costa del Sol. Laura Hamilton shows them a selection of properties available for purchase.

programme.title: High Noon
programme.desc: A town marshal is torn between love and duty on his wedding day as he prepares for the arrival of a vengeful adversary on the midday train. Meanwhile, the townsfolk the marshal has so loyally protected are certain he will be killed in the confrontation and abandon him one by one to face his enemy alone. Western, starring Gary Cooper, Grace Kelly, Lloyd Bridges and Lee Van Cleef.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Kew Gardens, London: Looking for the White House
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team visit the site of a forgotten palace built for George III at Kew Gardens in west London. The kitchen block is the only visible evidence that remains, so the immaculate lawns are ripped up in a search for the foundations.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team discover an unusual stone-covered grave as they race against the clock to excavate a Bronze Age cemetery in Fife, before land developers start work on the area.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Emma Greenfield and Daniel Halley search for a home on the Canary Island of Fuerteventura with a budget of £73,000. Presenter Jasmine Harman is on hand to show them a selection of properties on the market.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Mother and daughter Sue and Stacey Jones, who have a budget of £72,000, search for a holiday home that will also generate a rental income on Spain's Costa del Sol. Laura Hamilton shows them a selection of properties available for purchase.

programme.title: Selling Houses with Amanda Lamb
programme.desc: The host helps three homeowners struggling to sell their properties in Bromsgrove, Worcestershire, who are given £1,000 to make improvements before hoping to wow buyer Isabelle. Beautician Jo tones down the bold colours in her home, while Brian and Ann Marie take hold of their abandoned annex and garden, and Cheryl brightens up her bland decor.

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George meets a couple with a steadily expanding brood that has rapidly outgrown their narrowboat home. The pair are reluctant to give up their river-based lifestyle, and are on the market for a much wider Dutch barge. However, following through with their plan would mean sacrificing room height, leading to the development of a radical solution. He also visits a family planning to transform a dilapidated swimming pool into a sunken garden room, and heads to a Second World War decontamination bunker that has found a new lease of life as a luxury dwelling. Plus, the presenter's German road trip continues as he take in a futuristic lakeside house with sliding doors that provide an impressive view.

programme.title: Grand Designs Revisited
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud returns to a housing scheme in Birmingham, where a group of men and women with no construction experience agreed to build their own, and each other's, properties. Two years later their progress is examined to see how they have fared.

programme.title: Building the Dream
programme.desc: Charlie Luxton helps a woman and her boyfriend build a dream home in Peebles, Scotland, where the whole ground floor is devoted to stables for her horses.

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: Paramedics across Britain treat patients fighting for their lives. In Nottingham, Selina Conway is dispatched to a 76-year-old man who has collapsed in his garden, while Liam Wakefield heads to the home of an 18-year-old who has stopped breathing. In Essex, Sadie Bentley and recently qualified Anna Tansley are called by the coastguard to help resuscitate a man found floating in the sea.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Motorcyclist Richard, 23, is rushed into A&E by helicopter after crashing into a parked car and newly promoted consultant Fleur sends him off for scans, with his dad Ian racing to the hospital to check on his son's condition. Bar worker Bobby, 22, trod barefoot on a broken wine bottle and his best friend Sophie provides moral support and distracts him while junior doctor Ed stitches his wound. Meanwhile, 75-year-old Sarah has fallen and fractured her wrist, but deals with the pain stoically in the company of her daughter Lorraine and son Kieron.

programme.title: Big Fat Gypsy Weddings
programme.desc: First episode of the documentary series that explores the often extravagant and surprising world of gypsies and travellers in Britain, focusing on rite-of-passage celebrations to reveal the community's attitudes toward gender roles, education and outsiders. It begins with a look at the milestones in a gypsy girl's life, highlighting an eight-year-old's First Holy Communion and the spectacular wedding of a couple who met four months previously.

programme.title: Building the Dream
programme.desc: Charlie Luxton helps a woman and her boyfriend build a dream home in Peebles, Scotland, where the whole ground floor is devoted to stables for her horses.

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: Paramedics across Britain treat patients fighting for their lives. In Nottingham, Selina Conway is dispatched to a 76-year-old man who has collapsed in his garden, while Liam Wakefield heads to the home of an 18-year-old who has stopped breathing. In Essex, Sadie Bentley and recently qualified Anna Tansley are called by the coastguard to help resuscitate a man found floating in the sea.

programme.title: Kirstie's Vintage Gems
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp introduces new crafts, skills and techniques for interior decoration. In this edition, she reveals how to create a personalised vintage doormat and coasters, using spray paint, old tiles and serviettes.

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals
programme.sub-title: Fettuccine And Black Bean Beef Burgers
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares a selection of dishes including fettuccine, smoked trout, asparagus and peas, black bean beef burgers, noodles and pickle salad.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Emma Greenfield and Daniel Halley search for a home on the Canary Island of Fuerteventura with a budget of £73,000. Presenter Jasmine Harman is on hand to show them a selection of properties on the market.

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Kate Quilton heads to Spain to follow avocados on their journey to supermarkets in the UK, including a stop at specialist ripening rooms in Holland, while Jimmy Doherty visits a chicken farm to see if the conditions the birds are kept in affect the taste of their eggs. Matt Tebbutt is in Italy to examine what balsamic vinegar is made from and why it has such a wide price range.

programme.title: River Cottage Bites
programme.desc: Short highlights from Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall's adventures at the smallholding, revealing the secrets to whipping up simple culinary treats.

programme.title: Demetrius and the Gladiators
programme.desc: A Greek slave is forced into the gladiatorial service when he defends an elderly merchant from the attack of a sadistic centurion. But he also has the hallowed robe of Christ - which makes him the target of Emperor Caligula and the treacherous Messalina, because they believe it has special powers. However, the reluctant gladiator does not intend to give it up to them. Historical drama, starring Victor Mature, Susan Hayward, Michael Rennie and Debra Paget.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Castle Howard, Yorkshire: Not a Blot on the Landscape
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team are invited to search for the remains of a medieval village that was razed to make way for Castle Howard in North Yorkshire. With just three days to find evidence of the inhabitants, the dig proves to be something of a challenge - until a dusty cellar yields its secrets.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Sedgefield, Co Durham: A View to a Kiln
programme.desc: The experts examine aerial photographs of fields on the outskirts of Sedgefield in Co Durham, which reveal what appears to be a lost Roman town. If their hypothesis is correct it would be the most northerly Roman civilian settlement yet discovered. Plus, the team receives a visit from former prime minister Tony Blair, the one-time MP for Sedgefield.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton helps two men who have been friends since childhood search for a party house in northern Granada, Spain, with their joint budget of £27,000.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi meets recently divorced Rajula Jasani, who is ready for a fresh start and looks at what is on the market in and around the Spanish coastal town of Nerja. The property buyer plans to invest £100,000 in a second home that she can use with her twin sons and friends, and possibly relocate to in the future.

programme.title: Selling Houses with Amanda Lamb
programme.desc: The host helps three rival homeowners struggling to sell their properties in Milton Keynes, who are given £1,000 to make improvements before hoping to impress buyer Michelle. Hannah and Chris need to knock through their kitchen and transform their garden, while Paul and Becki are advised to alter their bedrooms, and Tim and Heather need to highlight the potential in their one bedroom bungalow.

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George follows the progress of a couple who want to transform two dilapidated air-raid shelters in their garden into his and hers sheds - but are arguing over who gets which one. He also meets the youngest designer ever featured on the show. Twelve-year-old Guinnie is taking her school project, to design the ultimate party shed, off the page and into her back garden - with the help of her builder dad. Will Hardie continues work on the floating beach hut and visits a million-pound beach house, to find out what is possible if money is no object, and in Germany, George explores an old water tower that has been transformed into a luxury home.

programme.title: Grand Designs Revisited
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud revisits Adrian and Corrina, who decided to build their first home out of a 300-year-old ruin in the Brecon Beacons. For the couple to complete the project a lot of work is needed - a difficult task on a restricted budget.

programme.title: Penelope Keith at Her Majesty's Service
programme.desc: New series. The actress travels around the country to visit the Queen's official residences and meet people with royal appointments. The journey begins in Windsor Castle, where she finds out about Britain's oldest order of chivalry, meets the Royal Herb Strewer and unearths a box of treasure dating back to Elizabeth I. She also takes a trip up the Thames in the gilded barge Gloriana.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Five-year-old Isa is rushed to A&E after being hit by a car and trapped underneath it, and doctors suspect the impact may have caused serious internal damage, as well as significant head injuries. Meanwhile, 26-year-old Tom is treated after slicing through his leg with a circular saw, with medics fearing the blade has cut so deeply into the muscle tissue that it could starve his leg of blood. Plus, 85-year-old retired actor Donald comes to the hospital with pain in his bladder, and consultant Faheem is concerned there may be an infection.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A young man who has had a severe reaction to a recreational drug is wheeled into Resus by paramedics, and senior sister Jen and the medical team face a challenge to calm their patient down so they can treat him. A 65-year-old woman is brought in by her best friends after hitting her head when she fell off a chair while playing bingo, and a 31-year-old man with multiple sclerosis is rushed in after developing a fever at home.

programme.title: Big Fat Gypsy Weddings
programme.desc: Pat Skye Lee is subject to criticism for choosing to marry someone from outside the Romany community, but his 17-year-old bride Sam Norton is determined to prove her credentials by acquiring a 14st wedding dress that lights up in the dark. Meanwhile, a six-year-old girl receives a spray tan in preparation for her first Communion, which her family is celebrating early before being evicted from a traveller site.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Five-year-old Isa is rushed to A&E after being hit by a car and trapped underneath it, and doctors suspect the impact may have caused serious internal damage, as well as significant head injuries. Meanwhile, 26-year-old Tom is treated after slicing through his leg with a circular saw, with medics fearing the blade has cut so deeply into the muscle tissue that it could starve his leg of blood. Plus, 85-year-old retired actor Donald comes to the hospital with pain in his bladder, and consultant Faheem is concerned there may be an infection.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A young man who has had a severe reaction to a recreational drug is wheeled into Resus by paramedics, and senior sister Jen and the medical team face a challenge to calm their patient down so they can treat him. A 65-year-old woman is brought in by her best friends after hitting her head when she fell off a chair while playing bingo, and a 31-year-old man with multiple sclerosis is rushed in after developing a fever at home.(n)

programme.title: Kirstie's Handmade Treasures
programme.desc: In this bite-sized episode, Kirstie Allsopp plans to surprise her guests with two main courses - roast beef with mulled wine gravy, and masala cauliflower with coconut stuffing for the vegetarians.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals
programme.sub-title: Falafel Wraps and Spiced Chicken Lentils
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver demonstrates his own brand of fast food by showing viewers how to prepare two quick recipes. On the menu are spiced chicken, with bacon, asparagus and spinach lentils, plus falafel wraps with grilled vegetables and salsa.(n)

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Kate Quilton heads to Spain to follow avocados on their journey to supermarkets in the UK, including a stop at specialist ripening rooms in Holland, while Jimmy Doherty visits a chicken farm to see if the conditions the birds are kept in affect the taste of their eggs. Matt Tebbutt is in Italy to examine what balsamic vinegar is made from and why it has such a wide price range.(n)

programme.title: Hugh's 3 Good Things: Best Bites
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall prepares a meal from the three main ingredients bream, lime and mint.(n)

programme.title: Lord Jim
programme.desc: A 19th-century sailor is branded a coward after jumping ship during a terrifying storm. To repair his damaged reputation, he embarks on a perilous journey through the Far East to deliver a consignment of explosives to a tribe rebelling against the oppression of a feudal warlord. Adventure, based on Joseph Conrad's famous novel, starring Peter O'Toole, James Mason, Eli Wallach, Jack Hawkins and Curt Jurgens.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team take part in a dig at the site of three historic jails buried under a police station car park in the old market town of Appleby, Cumbria. While hunting for the cells, the archaeologists find evidence of a renowned 18th-century escape and the infamous hanging room.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Glendon Hall, Northamptonshire: The Bodies in the Shed
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team investigate the mystery of human skeletons found under outbuildings at Glendon Hall, Northamptonshire. The remains seem to be aligned east to west, prompting the team to wonder whether they have stumbled upon medieval Christian peasant graves - a relic of the lost village of Glendon.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Presenter Sara Damergi goes house-hunting on Spain's Costa Blanca for Steve and Viv Jenkins, who have a budget of £130,000 and want a property they can use for holidays and their eventual retirement.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi helps John and Julia Baxter search for a retirement home in the Orihuela Costa area of Spain. The couple are desperate to escape the cold British winters, and have a budget of £100,000 to spend on the right property.(n)

programme.title: Selling Houses with Amanda Lamb
programme.desc: The host helps three homeowners struggling to sell their properties in Newport, south Wales who are each given £1,000 to make improvements before hoping to impress buyer Amy, who is looking for a family home. Jo adds some 1950s glamour to her abode, while Rita and Sid tone down their decor, and Lynette changes her colour scheme and makes her house more memorable for potential buyers.(n)

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: Architect George Clarke meets a young couple who have come up with a radical way of getting onto the housing ladder - they are building a home almost entirely from scrap on a budget of zero pounds. He also follows the progress of a woman putting together a garden retreat from reclaimed copper. The only problem is, she has no experience and suffers from rheumatoid arthritis. In Germany, George takes a futuristic houseboat out for a spin, and as the floating beach hut nears completion, there is drama in the workshop.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs Revisited
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud revisits a couple who hoped to restore a dilapidated Georgian house in London to its former glory. Once 200 years of redecoration and refurbishment had been stripped away, the property boasted elegant period features, but the pair still had to overcome daunting interior decay problems.(n)

programme.title: The Good Wife
programme.desc: Alicia throws a party to celebrate Howard and Jackie's upcoming wedding, but her night goes from bad to worse, while Eli asks Jason to investigate Peter ahead of his trial.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Schizophrenic Graham, 75, is brought to King's College Hospital after being stabbed in the neck by a stranger on his doorstep, and needs a CT scan to reveal the extent of his wound. Former nursery nurse Pat, 89, also arrives on the ward, having been found at the bottom of the stairs at home with no recollection of how she got there, while palliative care nurse Tracey treats 72-year-old retired postman Michael, who was recently diagnosed with lung cancer.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Johnny Vegas and Romesh Ranganathan join host Jimmy Carr and team captains Jon Richardson and Sean Lock for more comic innuendos, unpredictable conundrums and unforgivable puns in the words-and-numbers game. Josie Long is with Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while comedian Joe Wilkinson `helps' Rachel Riley with her mathematical sums and duties.(n)

programme.title: Revenge of the Nerds
programme.desc: Two social outcasts set up their own college fraternity for similarly un-hip students to give the campus sporting jocks a run for their money. Comedy, starring Anthony Edwards, Robert Carradine, Ted McGinley and Timothy Busfield.

programme.title: The Reckless Moment
programme.desc: A mother mistakenly believes her daughter has killed her good-for-nothing lover, and dumps his body in a harbour. Unfortunately, her drastic action attracts the attention of a strangely mild-mannered blackmailer. Drama, starring James Mason, Joan Bennett, Geraldine Brooks and Shepperd Strudwick.

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
programme.desc: Four brothers are reunited at their mother's funeral and discover their father was swindled out of his farm and subsequently murdered. However, as they set about avenging his death and reclaiming his land, a crook frames them for killing the sheriff. Western, starring John Wayne, Dean Martin, Earl Holliman, Michael Anderson Jr, James Gregory, George Kennedy and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: A Matter of Life and Death
programme.desc: A Second World War bomber pilot survives jumping out of his stricken plane without a parachute and falls in love with the radio operator he had first spoken to during the fateful flight. A heavenly messenger is sent to tell him he should have died and that his presence is required in the afterlife, but he remains determined to continue his life on Earth and insists on a trial to resolve the issue. Powell and Pressburger's romantic fantasy, starring David Niven, Kim Hunter, Roger Livesey and Marius Goring.

programme.title: The Tall T
programme.desc: A ranch hand hitches a ride on a stagecoach after losing his horse, but things go from bad to worse when the vehicle is hijacked by outlaws. The cowboy tries to bargain for the release of his fellow hostages - a newlywed couple - but his pleas fall on stony ground once the bandit leader learns the new bride is a rich heiress. Western, with Randolph Scott, Richard Boone, Maureen O'Sullivan and Henry Silva.

programme.title: Baggage Claim
programme.desc: An air hostess is horrified at the thought of her younger sister getting married while she is still single. She realises her job gives her access to eligible men from across America, and begins clocking up thousands of air miles as she scours the country for a potential fiance. Romantic comedy, with Paula Patton and Taye Diggs.

programme.title: The Eagle
programme.desc: A Roman centurion seeks to restore his father's honour by recovering the standard of a legion that disappeared. Accompanied by his British slave, he makes a dangerous journey north of Hadrian's Wall into the Scottish Highlands, territory occupied by hostile tribes. Action adventure, starring Channing Tatum, Jamie Bell, Mark Strong and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: Skyline
programme.desc: A couple visiting a friend in Los Angeles end up in the middle of an alien invasion. Lights shine from the sky, mesmerising anyone who looks at them and sucking them up into the spacecraft hovering overhead. The couple lead a group of survivors in search of a safe hiding place from the extraterrestrials. Sci-fi thriller, with Eric Balfour and Scottie Thompson.

programme.title: The Last Picture Show
programme.desc: Three teenagers living in an economically struggling town in the backwoods of Texas face an uncertain future. When a tragedy strikes the community, they are forced to choose between making the best of their lives at home or seeking their fortune elsewhere. Peter Bogdanovich's drama, starring Jeff Bridges, Cybill Shepherd, Timothy Bottoms, Cloris Leachman and Ben Johnson.

programme.title: Cattle Empire
programme.desc: A trail boss, released from prison after serving five years following a rampage by his men, accepts a job from the community's leading citizen to head up a cattle drive. However, he still harbours a grudge against his employers and seizes the chance for revenge when a rival cattle baron makes him a tempting offer. Western, starring Joel McCrea, Gloria Talbott, Don Haggerty and Phyllis Coates.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A farmer in need of money agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train arrives to transport him to jail. Meanwhile, the pair are holed up in a hotel, where his prisoner plays mind games with him - and the villain's cohorts are waiting outside ready to engineer an escape. Western adapted from a novel by Elmore Leonard, with Van Heflin, Glenn Ford, Felicia Farr and Leora Dana.

programme.title: Great Expectations
programme.desc: An orphan falls in love with the cold-hearted adopted daughter of an eccentric old woman. A mysterious benefactor gives him the chance to rise through London's high society, but in the process he forgets his humble roots and is not prepared for the truth about the girl he loves and the stranger funding his new life. Drama, based on Charles Dickens' novel, starring John Mills, Jean Simmons, Finlay Currie and Alec Guinness.

programme.title: Sink the Bismarck
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama, charting the mission to track down and eliminate the pride of the German fleet, a fearsome battleship devastating British vessels in the North Atlantic, orchestrated by a British naval officer recovering from his wife's death in an air raid. Starring Kenneth More, Dana Wynter, Laurence Naismith and Karel Stepanek.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A casino magnate approaches a group of no-hopers with the offer of $2million to whoever retrieves the sum from a locker in a train station in New Mexico, prompting a madcap cross-continent dash. Meanwhile, the casino owner's high-rolling gambler friends place bets on which of the bumbling contestants will win. Comedy, with Rowan Atkinson, John Cleese, Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Bates, Seth Green and Cuba Gooding Jr.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A repairman is assigned to salvage the remaining resources from Earth, which has been left a devastated wasteland after a war with an alien race. He discovers a human survivor on the surface of the planet, an encounter that exposes secrets from the past that threaten the future of the human race. Sci-fi adventure, starring Tom Cruise and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Bully
programme.desc: A violent and sadistic bully makes life a misery for other teenagers, pushes around his so-called best friend and rapes a local girl. Eventually, his victims all band together to have him killed, hiring an incompetent hitman to do the job. But things do not go entirely as they planned. Fact-based drama from Kids director Larry Clark. Starring Brad Renfro, Rachel Miner, Bijou Phillips and Nick Stahl.

programme.title: The Look of Love
programme.desc: Fact-based drama following the life of entrepreneur Paul Raymond, who became one of Britain's wealthiest men through an empire of strip clubs and pornography publishing, and his relationships with three women - his choreographer wife, his glamour model lover and the daughter he hoped would become his heir. Starring Steve Coogan, Anna Friel and Imogen Poots.(n)

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: A Christian Viking prince is invited to King Arthur's court, where he discovers the most trusted man at Camelot is hatching a fiendish plot to bring about the demise of the king and the Knights of the Round Table. Adventure, based on the newspaper comic-strip by Hal Foster, starring Robert Wagner, Janet Leigh, James Mason, Debra Paget and Sterling Hayden.(n)

programme.title: Operation Pacific
programme.desc: A submarine commander is troubled by his failing marriage and the death of his commanding officer, but puts his personal problems aside and embarks on a dangerous mission against the Japanese fleet. Second World War adventure, starring John Wayne, Patricia Neal, Ward Bond, Scott Forbes and Philip Carey.(n)

programme.title: The Towering Inferno
programme.desc: The world's tallest building goes up in flames during the opening celebrations. While the architect who designed the skyscraper tries to save the party-goers trapped on the 135th floor, a fire chief leads a valiant attempt to fight the blaze. Disaster movie, starring Paul Newman, Steve McQueen, Faye Dunaway, William Holden, Fred Astaire, Richard Chamberlain, Susan Blakely and Robert Vaughn.(n)

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: Siberian gulag prisoners stage a daring escape during the Second World War. Refusing to live under Stalin's rule, they embark on a gruelling 4,500-mile journey across inhospitable terrain to escape the Soviet Union. Peter Weir's drama, starring Ed Harris, Colin Farrell, Saoirse Ronan, Jim Sturgess and Mark Strong.(n)

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Account of the life of medieval Scottish hero William Wallace. After the slaughter of his father and brother, young Wallace is taken in by his uncle, who teaches him how to use not only his brawn but his brain - which he employs to great effect years later when he resolves to drive the English out of Scotland. Oscar-winning historical epic, directed by and starring Mel Gibson. With Patrick McGoohan, Sophie Marceau and Catherine McCormack.(n)

programme.title: Jackpot247
programme.desc: Viewers are offered the chance to participate in live interactive gaming from the comfort of their sofas, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.

programme.title: The Jeremy Kyle Show
programme.desc: The host invites guests to air their differences over family and relationship issues, and provides them with his own brand of no-nonsense advice.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: The Jeremy Kyle Show
programme.desc: The host invites guests to air their differences over family and relationship issues, and provides them with his own brand of no-nonsense advice.

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: A lively mix of news and current affairs, plus health, entertainment and lifestyle features.

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Entertainment and fashion news, as well as showbiz stories, cooking and celebrity gossip. Presented by Lorraine Kelly.

programme.title: The Jeremy Kyle Show
programme.desc: The host invites guests to air their differences over family and relationship issues, and provides them with his own brand of no-nonsense advice.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: Phillip Schofield and Holly Willoughby present celebrity chat and lifestyle features, including a look at the stories making the newspaper headlines and a recipe in the kitchen. Including Local Weather.

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: More celebrity interviews and topical debate from a female perspective.

programme.title: Judge Rinder
programme.desc: Cameras follow criminal barrister Robert Rinder as he takes on real-life cases in a studio courtroom.

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: David Dickinson is in Edinburgh where David Hakeney feels the pressure, a model catches Alys Dobbie's eye and a guitar signed by Fish rocks Henry Nicholls' world.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Game show, hosted by Ben Shephard, in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as contestants Paula, Steve, Carol and Tom pit their wits against ruthless quiz genius the Chaser in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: James excitedly makes plans for the future while driving through the country, only to end up knocking Chas down. He takes her to hospital, where she confesses to a nurse that she thinks she might be pregnant - which would mean Gordon is the father. Meanwhile, Emma becomes suspicious when she hears James and Chas have been seen together. Jacob makes a grand gesture to make David feel better.

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade searches for alien-like super sharks, from the very first river monster, an eel-like horror, to a lethal giant nick-named the Buzz-saw Killer. He tracks down extraordinary living fish across the planet to link him to long-lost worlds, but which of the prehistoric terrors has the edge?.

programme.title: Don't Look Down: Rope Men
programme.desc: Personal cameras and drones follow industrial abseilers as they scale iconic buildings such as Tower Bridge, and Alexandra Palace. There's trouble in Dubai when a specialist team are suspended 800ft up a skyscraper in 118-degree heat, and climbers in Plymouth also face problems when they meet a protective mother seagull defending her nest of chicks.

programme.title: EU Referendum - ITV
programme.sub-title: Cameron and Farage Live: The EU Referendum
programme.desc: David Cameron wants Britain to remain in the European Union, while Nigel Farage has been campaigning for Britain to leave the EU for more than 20 years. Julie Etchingham presents as they answer questions from a studio audience of up to 200 people, live from a London location.

programme.title: You Saw Them Here First
programme.desc: The show exploring the TV debuts of some of Britain's most famous faces returns, showcasing clips of said celebrities from before they became household names. This edition features early appearances by Cilla star Sheridan Smith, Bond's Daniel Craig, Luther actor Idris Elba, singer Paloma Faith, actor and TV presenter Bradley Walsh and QI quizmaster Stephen Fry. Plus, further surprises are in store in the celebrity video booth as Arabella Weir, Judy Parfitt, Neil Dudgeon, Danny John-Jules and Emmerdale's Meg Johnson are given a chance to revisit their on-screen past.

programme.title: Columbo: Double Exposure
programme.desc: A maker of motivational films based on subliminal messages uses his expertise to plant a subconscious command in the mind of a rival to lure him to his death. However, any hopes of his getting away with it are dashed by the arrival of a certain shabby sleuth. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Robert Culp, Robert Middleton, Louise Latham and Arlene Martel.

programme.title: Judge Rinder

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: David Dickinson and the team are in Harrogate, North Yorkshire, where Simon Schneider gets into a row over a car mascot, and Helen Gardiner is ganged up on.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Game show, hosted by Ben Shephard, in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as four contestants pit their wits against ruthless quiz genius the Chaser in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught.

programme.title: Referendum Campaign Broadcast
programme.desc: A referendum broadcast by the Britain Stronger in Europe campaign, ahead of the referendum on the UK's membership of the European Union on June 23, 2016.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Emma plays up her faked illness to find out what has really been going on between Chas and James, but it may lead to her lies being exposed when he pays a visit to Dr Bailey. Lawrence and Ronnie remember old times and seem to be on the verge of making peace, and David finds his new appearance hard to live with.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: The police suggest that Todd, Tony and Jason conspired to kill Callum between them, while Steve is consumed with jealousy over Michelle and Will. Elsewhere, Sean is fuming when Billy heads out to help Lee, and Beth has a go at Tim for letting Craig sample his home brew.

programme.title: Sunday Night at the Palladium
programme.desc: Host Bradley Walsh welcomes soul and pop band Simply Red, French electro swing band Caravan Palace, singer-songwriter Pixie Lott, and the cast of the musical Charlie and the Chocolate Factory to the Palladium stage. Plus, there is entertainment by comic Dane Baptiste, Britain's Got Talent winners Attraction, and speciality act Naked Lunch, and singer Peter Andre may finally get to perform on the world-famous stage. Last in the series.

programme.title: Secrets of Growing Up
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the surprising secrets of growing up, from girls developing faster than boys during childhood, to taking risks and staying in bed until past midday as teenagers, and eventually becoming emotionally mature during the final stages of the process. Narrated by Martin Clunes.

programme.title: Heathrow: Britain's Busiest Airport
programme.desc: An American airline has one of its busiest days as hundreds of people fly to the USA for Thanksgiving, while Heathrow employee Sunita helps a woman who has lost her two-year old daughter. Ground staff use measures to disperse birds from the runway to prevent any collisions with aircraft, resident paramedic Izzy treats a pregnant passenger suffering from serious abdominal pain who is due to fly to Brazil that day and British Airways employees prepare for the inaugural flight of their new £185 million aircraft the Dreamliner.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica visits the zoo to research her latest novel, where a venomous snake kills an animal rights activist. Mystified as to how the black mamba could escape, the amateur sleuth tries to discover whether there was a human hand behind the incident. Angela Lansbury stars.

programme.title: Pop Gold
programme.desc: The anthology show delving into ITV's music archives stops off in the 1980s, the decade that good taste passed by, with stonewashed jeans, big hair and make-up everywhere people turned - and that was just the men. But if 1980s fashion was memorable, its music was even more so, with the likes of Bon Jovi, Adam Ant, Spandau Ballet and A-ha hitting the charts. They are just some of the many stars featured in this tribute to the music of the decade, as seen on ITV. Narrated by Andy Kershaw.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat

Meanwhile in Brisbane, Carol visits a monastery to find out more about her long-lost brother, but her search leads to a trap when she receives a call from someone claiming to have information. Starring Joe McFadden, Clare Wille and Lisa Kay.

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Simon Goddard's return from Australia worries the locals, but the former factory owner declares he is only visiting his daughter Amy. Kim enjoys the company of Alistair and his family, leaving Danny green with envy. Joe and Alice prepare to come clean about their relationship - until a bad-tempered Harding makes them change their mind.

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: A romantic escapade goes horribly wrong for a couple involved in a motorbike accident, and the tragic events of the night leave the staff of St Aiden's struggling to heal more than just a broken heart. Matron investigates when one of Dr Ormerod's patients is uneasy about returning home, while Ken and Alun tackle a plague of rodents threatening to close down the hospital - helped by local rogue Claude Greengrass.

programme.title: The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Adventure of the Illustrious Client
programme.desc: An illustrious client hires Holmes to dissuade a wealthy socialite from marrying the sinister Baron Gruner, an Austrian nobleman with an unsavoury reputation. Guest starring Anthony Valentine.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mason and Dawson continue their search for Rosie in Australia, and after ruling out Mick as a suspect, turn their attention to a local roadhouse near to where a missing woman's car was found abandoned. The search is on for the bar owner's son when the police discover he has a criminal record. Meanwhile, Carol delivers Nev's sister's baby and is later overjoyed when long-lost brother Danny arrives in town. Starring Joe McFadden and Clare Wille.

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Dr Cheriton confounds his critics, and Dr Weatherill learns an important lesson about the folly of jumping to conclusions. Meanwhile, Alan and Tony agree to pick up a package for Greengrass, only to discover it's actually a coffin allegedly containing the body of his sister. Medical drama, starring Julian Ovenden, Robert Daws, Wendy Craig and Amy Robbins.

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: The locals are preoccupied with personal problems as Sally worries about her marriage, and Harding fears he is being undermined both at the factory and at home. Rural drama, starring Thomas Craig, Samantha Giles and Brian Capron.

programme.title: In Loving Memory

programme.desc: Olive and Mum go on a spending spree, leaving Stan to foot the bill. Comedy, starring Reg Varney.

programme.desc: A barman from rural inn the Maid in Splendour is shot dead as he walks near a ruined cottage in woodlands - and Barnaby's investigation reveals a clash between charming landlord Michael Bannerman, the unofficial squire of Midsomer Worthy, and his abrasive son Stephen, who now runs the pub. John Nettles and John Hopkins star, with guest appearances by William Gaunt, Alan Cox, Dave Hill and Frances Tomelty.

Medical drama, starring Julian Ovenden, Robert Daws, Wendy Craig and Bill Maynard.

programme.title: In Loving Memory
programme.desc: Billy takes Ivy's advice - he finds a bride, and elopes.

programme.desc: A valuable heirloom brought back from the China Sea could change the Ropers' fortunes - but not if Mildred's sister gets it first. Starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce.

programme.desc: First episode of the drama, starring Michael Kitchen as a jaded police superintendent who would rather be fighting the enemy in France than crime on the south coast as the Second World War gathers pace in 1940. However, when a local magistrate's German wife is murdered amid a growing cloud of uncertainty and anti-Nazi feeling, the ensuing investigation is anything but routine. Edward Fox, Robert Hardy, David Horovitch, Anthony Howell and Honeysuckle Weeks co-star.

programme.desc: The detective and his team embark on a race against time to recapture a dangerous convict who has escaped from Bodmin prison - a case that leads them to an elaborate drugs racket. Starring Jack Shepherd, Helen Masters, Jimmy Yuill and Sean Chapman.

programme.desc: While investigating an incoming consignment of tobacco, John Danson finds himself an assassination target. Medical drama, starring Julian Ovenden, Robert Daws, Bill Maynard and Amy Robbins.(n)

programme.desc: The townsfolk are still coming to terms with Sally's death, while Danny and Cady move into Kim's house to make space for the Boothes - leading to a declaration of love. programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Beckett and her team investigate when the star of a college swimming team is found dead in a pool, with the victim's ex-girlfriend, his coach and an Olympic champion all coming under suspicion. Castle soon regrets bringing along his protege Alex Conrad when Beckett takes a shine to him, so he invites him to a poker night where authors Michael Connelly and Dennis Lehane (appearing as themselves) pick apart the younger man's theories about the case. Starring Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic.

programme.title: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Nick Wallis turns his attention to violence on the streets of Britain that is fuelled by drink or drugs, and finds out how technological advances are helping to fight crime and secure convictions. In Huntingdon, Cambridgeshire, a CCTV operator spots a man being punched unconscious after escaping a mass brawl and does her best to keep track of the assailant and direct the police to him. There is also footage of a fight in which a man is knocked to the floor and a woman wearing stilettos stamps on his face, and an incident outside a burger bar escalates into a relentless and violent assault.

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of dedicated volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.

programme.title: Great Artists
programme.desc: Seventeenth-century Dutch painter Jan Vermeer, the lowly son of an innkeeper and art dealer, lived an uneventful life, leaving fewer than 40 authenticated works and dying unknown outside his home town. Tim Marlow investigates how his talent came to be regarded as highly as Rembrandt's, and examines the simple domestic scenes that led to his posthumous rise to fame.

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Property expert Ann Maurice offers advice to Teresa and Nigel Parfitt, the would-be sellers of a two-bedroom semi in Cradley Heath in the heart of the Black Country. Ann sets about ridding the house of its clutter and collectibles, tones down the garish decor and tries to rectify the hygiene problems that come with having four dogs.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild UK
programme.desc: Ben meets Simon and Debbie, a former estate agent and lawyer respectively who swapped city life for a hidden-valley smallholding in the middle of Exmoor National Park. They now have more than 100 animals, some of which they keep for company, others which are destined for the table. However, their new life isn't an easy one. During his stay Ben learns how to rear, kill and cook `extreme free-range' pigs, tries his hand at foraging in steep woodland and tries to clear an old woodland with a stubborn horse who is suffering from hay fever.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian Norton is called out to help a pregnant cow that is struggling to give birth to its calf. When it becomes clear the lives of both animals may be in jeopardy, Julian is forced to consider performing an emergency caesarean. Meanwhile, Peter Wright comes to the aid of Lofty, a horse in need of some dental work, and a concerned caller reports a bird with an unusual - and embarrassing - injury.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: New series. Emma Willis ushers in another diverse group of fame-seeking individuals who have been chosen to spend their summer invading the nation's living rooms. This year, the house has been made over into a stark monochrome world. However, while everything may appear black and white, the new residents will not be alone - they will be be under attack from a dark, unseen force designed to have a divisive effect on the entire housemates as they fall victim to paranoia and suspicion.

programme.desc: A patient with neuropathy consults Dr Clare MacMichael, but their constipation and weight loss gives the GP cause for concern. programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi visits the Harrogate Motel in North Yorkshire, where the owners are deliberately not telling their guests that the establishment is situated in the middle of a muddy equine centre. Mother and son duo Jennifer and Drew Birtwistle are horse lovers first and hoteliers second, but despite providing five-star accommodation for horses, the bedrooms are leaving the guests far from happy. Alex steps in and demands the owners start being more upfront about what they are offering, and tries to turn the horse-loving hosts into hospitality pros.

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: Women who claim benefits while looking after several children. They include Chesterfield mum Maria, who has five kids to five different dads and has not worked since 2002. She is so desperate to get off benefits she has signed herself up to the same college course as her daughter. Birmingham woman Karen has six children and a seventh on the way with partner Ashleigh - and although his job search is not going well he keeps himself busy in other ways. In Weymouth, Kate picks up almost £30,000 a year in benefits to supplement her husband Ian's income as a taxi driver - and spends more than £170 a month of this on pocket money for her seven kids.(n)

programme.desc: Documentary focusing on disputes with murderous consequences. Russell moved to Cheltenham with his wife Leo, and soon formed a firm friendship with next-door friendship George. But when Russell erected a pergola, tempers flared over the garden fence, and a violent saw attack saw both men at loggerheads. A couple in Chelsea were unhappy when their neighbour submitted plans for a basement build, claiming the construction would destroy their peace and work - but that was nothing compared to the surprise they got after catching him on CCTV.(n)

programme.title: Caught on Camera

programme.desc: The return of the documentary in which journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The first episode exposes the rise in ram raids across the UK, with footage of two masked men using a 4x4 to pull the front off a cash machine at the University of East Anglia in Norwich. Nick also shows how detectives used laser-scanning technology to recreate a crime scene and close in on a gang that terrorised West Yorkshire pub owners in 2013.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Cameras return to Balham Park Surgery and in this edition, the GPs treat patients with problems below the waist. Dr Heather Watson sees Eric, a man suffering from dizzy spells and an itchy back passage which keeps him awake at night. Meanwhile, Dr Sara Kayat is consulted by Hayley, who is suffering from anxiety and a lack of self-confidence after being successfully treated for cervical cancer. Dr Chris Pearce is visited by John, who has a worrying family history of prostate cancer, and has heard that a healthy prostate should be roughly the size of a walnut. However, he has just returned from the Czech Republic, where walnuts are twice the size of the British variety.(n)

However, when she cannot find any evidence, she resorts to an abduction of her own. Thriller, starring Moira Kelly and Amanda Tapping.(n)

programme.desc: Job-seekers whose benefits have been reduced by the Government, including Doncaster single mum Sammy who has had her income support cut by 20 per cent after missing a job centre appointment. Former security guard Brian from Gateshead had to leave his job due to poor health - only to have his benefits lowered when he was told he was not doing enough to find work. Bradford ex-con Anthony moved into a new flat - but could not afford a bed, cooker or washing machine - while in Stockton-on-Tees, mum-of-three Simone stripped off in protest when her sister's dole was cut.(n)

programme.title: Togrøverens kone (3:5)
programme.desc: Britisk dramaserie fra 2012.Ronald Biggs er blevet idømt 30 års fængsel for sin medvirken i tidens største togrøveri, og hans kone Charmian er ulykkelig. Men et vellykket flugtforsøg sætter Ronald på fri fod, og parret flygter med deres to børn til Australien i håb om at kunne begynde på en frisk. Lettelsen over at være sluppet væk bliver dog kortvarig. For da Ronalds gamle medsammensvorne Bruce Reynolds bliver arresteret, bliver de mindet om, at fortiden kan indhente dem når som helst. (t). Episode : 3:5. Genre : Serier. Year : 2012

programme.title: To sønner (9:22)
programme.desc: Amerikansk dramaserie.I New Orleans erfarer Rudy, at Charles Estep ikke viger tilbage for at begå mord. Ramona svigter Wesley til fordel for Billy. (t)

programme.title: Kystvagten (9:68)
programme.desc: Australsk dramaserie.Narkosmugling, ulovligt fiskeri, menneskesmugling, ueksploderede miner og sågar terrorisme. Det er blot nogle af de problemer, der møder kaptajnløjtnant Mike Flynn og resten af besætningen på patruljebåden HMAS Hammersley, når de dagligt overvåger farvandet omkring Australiens kyster. Også blandt besætningen går bølgerne af og til højt. For det kan være sin sag at leve sammen i månedsvis på meget lidt plads. (t). Episode : 9:68. Genre : Serier. Year : 2007

programme.title: Under Hammeren
programme.desc: I Under Hammeren er alt på spil, når der rundt om i Danmark afholdes auktioner over alt fra blomster og kvæg til fine antikviteter og konkursboer. Hvem får solgt til prisen, og hvor langt er køberne egentlig villige til at gå. I dagens afsnit sælger Klaus Pedersen en dyrerace, som man ikke ser hver dag på Aars Landboauktion. Hos Dansk Maskinbørs i Herning håber auktionarius Johannes Jensen på mange gæster til dagens eftersyn. Og hos Campen Auktioner slås Finn med vejret til dagens auktion. (t). Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2015

programme.title: Kender Du Typen? (4:8)
programme.desc: I aften tager Kender Du Typen? til Fyn og besøger en mand, der går på jagt, kører i store biler og går med manchetknapper. Han er dog også typen, der vil bestemme, hvordan kopperne i køkkenskabet skal se ud, og som køber lige så dyre cremer som sin kone. Mon Anne Glad og Christian Grau kan regne ud, hvem denne sammensatte person er? Gæt med på facebook.com/KenderDuTypen. Vært: Mads Steffensen. Sendt første gang 27.01.14 (t). Episode : 4:8. Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2014

programme.title: Hammerslag 2008 (8)
programme.desc: Hammerslag starter denne gang med et romantisk stråtækt fiskerhus ved Jammerbugten. Der er små bondehusvinduer og lavt til loftet, og sådan noget betaler man ekstra for. Næste udfordring har også strå på taget og ligger i landsbyen Kollerup i Nordjylland. Til sidst står den på charme lige midt i Ålborg med brosten uden for døren. Et byhus i perfekt stand selvom det har 200 år på bagen. Kan mæglerne gætte at kvadratmeterne er blandt de dyreste i byen. Sendt første gang 16.09.08 (t). Episode : 8. Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2008

programme.title: 90'erne tur retur: 1991
programme.desc: Vi tager et nostalgisk kig i bakspejlet. Vi ser tilbage på store og små begivenheder, fra legendariske ledere til lallende legebørn

programme.title: Udsendelsesophør
programme.desc: Udsendelsesophør

programme.title: Ikke Okay (2:8)
programme.desc: Er du også en gang imellem i tvivl om, hvordan man egentlig skal opføre sig? Det er værterne Helle Joof og Thomas Skov Gaardsvig, så i "Ikke okay" forsøger de, at finde på nye regler om takt og tone. I dette program handler det om, hvordan man holder fest og hvordan man er en god gæst. Så her er svar på, om en skinke egentlig er en god værtindegave, hvordan man fortæller en god gammeldags vittighed og hvor tæt man må danse med andres partnere. (t). Episode : 2:8. Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2016

programme.title: De store katte (56)
programme.desc: Naturprogram fra BBC.Den halvvoksne gepardunge Duma er stadig i gang med at finpudse sin jagtteknik. Men da hendes mor pludselig forlader hende, er hun nødt til at blive voksen i en fart. Hvis hun skal overleve, må hun i løbet af de næste to dage nedlægge sit første bytte. Sumpløvernes lederhan har efter tre dages konstant parring omsider fattet, at den unge løvinde har fået nok, og vender tilbage til flokken, der, indtil de store dyreflokke kommer forbi, må klare sig på bedste beskub, bl.a. ved at stjæle bytte fra mindre katte som leoparden Bella. (t). Episode : 56. Genre : Natur & Miljø. Year : 1996

programme.title: Vilde fødsler - Orangutanger
programme.desc: Britisk naturserie fra 2015.Dyrlægen Mark Evans og anatomen Joy Reidenberg udforsker de vidunderlige og ind imellem temmelig mærkværdige måder, som dyr føder deres unger på. I Borneo undersøger Mark og Joy de udfordringer, som de store orangutanger har med at parre sig, føde og opfostre deres unger højt oppe i trætoppene. (t). Genre : Dokumentar. Year : 2015

programme.title: De flyvende læger (206:224)
programme.desc: Australsk dramaserie.I den lille australske flække Cooper's Crossing holder den flyvende lægetjeneste til. I den tyndt befolkede landsdel er der langt til lægen, så i stedet må læger og sygeplejersker flyve ud til områdets afsidesliggende gårde, kvægstationer og minelandsbyer for at yde lægehjælp - ofte under vanskelige og farlige forhold. (t). Episode : 206:224. Genre : Serier. Year : 1986

programme.title: De flyvende læger (207:224)
programme.desc: Australsk dramaserie.I den lille australske flække Cooper's Crossing holder den flyvende lægetjeneste til. programme.title: Jordemoderen V (4:10)
programme.desc: Engelsk dramaserie fra 2016.Jordemoderen Barbara står over for sin karrieres største udfordring, da en havnearbejders højgravide hustru tvinges til at træffe en svær beslutning. Samtidig får Phyllis Crane en ny, mandlig ven - som viser sig at have en hemmelighed. (t). Episode : 4:10. Genre : Serier. Year : 2015

programme.title: Antikkrejlerne (123)
programme.desc: Britisk dokumentarserie fra 2010.Hver uge rejser to antikvitetseksperter med 200 pund på lommen til en egn af Storbritannien for i små antikvitetsbutikker at gå på jagt efter netop det fund, der kan indbringe køberen den største fortjenenste på den nærmeste auktion. (t). Episode : 123. Genre : Serier. Year : 2012

programme.title: Antikkrejlerne (124)
programme.desc: Britisk dokumentarserie fra 2010.Hver uge rejser to antikvitetseksperter med 200 pund på lommen til en egn af Storbritannien for i små antikvitetsbutikker at gå på jagt efter netop det fund, der kan indbringe køberen den største fortjenenste på den nærmeste auktion. programme.title: Under Hammeren
programme.desc: I Under Hammeren er alt på spil, når der rundt om i Danmark afholdes auktioner over alt fra blomster og kvæg til fine antikviteter og konkursboer. Hvem får solgt til prisen, og hvor langt er køberne egentlig villige til at gå. I dagens afsnit afholder Bruun Rasmussen et vurderingsarrangement i Marienlyst, som byder på mange spændende ting. Hos Dansk Maskinbørs i Herning sætter et beskedent fremmøde sit præg på priserne. Og hos Svendborg Auktionerne er stemningen høj, da der afholdes indboauktion. (t). Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2015

programme.title: Kender Du Typen? (5:8)
programme.desc: Kender Du Typen? besøger en kendt dansker, der har haft Thomas Helmig som bryllupsmusikant. Hvem er det mon, der gerne bruger 15.000 kroner på en taske, og som altid har Stryhns leverpostej i køleskabet? Det skal livsstilseksperterne Anne Glad og Christian Grau spore sig ind på i aftenens program, som begynder hos en af de mange heste, der bor i hovedpersonens baghave. Vært: Mads Steffensen. Sendt første gang 03.02.14 (t). Episode : 5:8. Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2014

programme.title: Hammerslag 2008 (9)
programme.desc: Hvad koster sommerhuse i det svage ejendomsmarked anno 2008, når nu de ligger i nogle af Danmarks bedste badebyer. Vi starter med et stort nybygget sommerhus på toppen af klitterne i Blokhus inden turen går til Løkken og et lille fritidshus i første række. To super lækre ejendomme, der dog blegner ved siden af aftenens sidste ejendom. Et 100 år gammelt sommerhus i bakkerne i Lønstrup. Her er der tale om ægte liebhaveri og det koster kassen. Sendt første gang 23.09.08 (t). Episode : 9. Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2008

programme.title: Taggart: Dræberfilosofien (1:3)
programme.desc: Skotsk krimiserie fra 1987.Glasgow-detektiven Taggart efterforsker en række brutale voldtægtsforsøg, der kulminerer i et kvindemord begået med armbrøst

programme.title: Taggart: Dræberfilosofien (2:3)
programme.desc: Skotsk krimiserie fra 1987.En kvindelig kiropraktor er død - dræbt med en armbrøst. Taggart mistænker hendes mand - men har stadig et godt øje til våbensamleren Lang og voldtægtsforbryderen Caldwell. Snart sker der endnu et overfald

programme.title: Taggart: Dræberfilosofien (3:3)
programme.desc: Skotsk krimiserie fra 1987.En række uhyggelige overfald og et kvindemord har inspireret et elskende par, der vil rydde en ubelejlig ægtemand af vejen. Imens forfølger Taggart og hans assistent Livingstone deres gamle spor - våbensamleren Lang og voldtægtsforbryderen Caldwell

programme.title: Hamish Macbeth (8:20)
programme.desc: Skotsk krimiserie fra 1996.Hamish forsøger at finde ud af, hvad der er blevet af en lokal fisker, som har været på havet i tre uger uden at give lyd fra sig. Samtidig har Barney Meldrum og Lachie Junior fundet en ny måde at fiske penge ud af turisternes lommer på. (t). Episode : 8:20. Genre : Serier. Year : 1995

programme.title: Jordemoderen V (5:10)
programme.desc: Engelsk dramaserie fra 2016.Poplar rammes af et udbrud af tyfus, og forsøget på at spore smittekilden truer med at splitte en familie. Samtidig havner søster Winfred i et dilemma, da hun forsøger at rådgive en lærerinde, der er blevet gravid med en gift mand. (t). Episode : 5:10. Genre : Serier. Year : 2015

programme.title: TV AVISEN
programme.desc: TV AVISEN

programme.title: Antikduellen (5:20)
programme.desc: Antikduellanterne Margit Damgaard og Lasse Franck handler i Ringsted. De to antikhandlere får - mandag til onsdag - hver 10.000 kroner til at handle antikviteter og retroting for. Efter 5 timer får de deres ting vurderet af en vurderingsekspert, og dagens vinder er den antikhandler med de bedste vurderinger. Torsdag er finaledagen, hvor alle ugens antikviteter og retrofund bliver sat endeligt under hammeren på Svendborg Auktionerne. I denne uge dyster Margit Damgaard, indehaver af Damgaard-Lauritsen Antik i Odense, mod Lasse Franck, der driver Refurniture i Randers. Og i dag, mandag, jagter de skatte i Ringsted og omegn. (t). Episode : 5:20. Genre : Dokumentar. Year : 2015

programme.title: Kære nabo - gør bras til bolig - Møn
programme.desc: Det var mildt sagt et håndværkertilbud, Jonas H. Petersen overtog, da han købte det gulpudsede hus på hovedgaden i den lille by, Borre, på Møn. Han gik da også i gang med renoveringsarbejdet med det samme, og for at udnytte sin tid bedst muligt, flyttede han ind i en campingvogn på grunden. Men under renoveringen faldt Jonas igennem loftet oppe fra første sal og brækkede sin fod adskillige steder. Alt gik i stå, og Jonas blev sygemeldt fra sit arbejde - både ude og hjemme i huset. Derfor har hans ven og kollega, Henrik Ørbæk, kontaktet designer, Natalia Sanchez, og skattejæger, Søren Falk, da han ikke kan bære tanken om, at Jonas skal tilbringe en hel vinter mere i sin campingvogn. Og heldigvis er gode naboer ikke sene til at træde til - både med arbejdskraft og gode genbrugsfund. Så mon ikke Jonas får rigtig tag over hovedet, inden kulden får fat? (t). Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2016

programme.title: Aldrig for sent (4:4)
programme.desc: Bjarne, Flemming og Claus. Hver femte dansker har på grund af en konflikt mistet kontakten til et eller flere familiemedlemmer. En udstrakt hånd resulterer ikke altid i en genskabt relation. Det har de tre fædre Bjarne, Flemming og Claus måtte erkende. De tre fædre har levet meget forskellige liv, men de har én ting til fælles. De er blevet valgt fra af deres børn. Nu sætter de sig ned med Ulla, så de i fællesskab kan finde ud af hvorfor de er valgt fra, hvordan de kan leve med det og hvordan fremtiden kommer til at se ud. (t). Episode : 4:4. Genre : Dokumentar. Year : 2015

programme.title: Togrøverens kone (4:5)
programme.desc: Britisk dramaserie fra 2012.Ronald og Charmian Biggs er flygtet til Australien, efter at Ronald er stukket af fra fængslet i England, hvor han er idømt 30 år bag tremmer for togrøveri. De forsøger at stable et nyt liv på benene, men da en stikker fortæller politiet, hvor parret opholder sig, jages Ronald igen på flugt. Han forlader Australien på et dampskib til Rio de Janeiro og efterlader Charmian alene tilbage med parrets tre børn. (t). Episode : 4:5. Genre : Serier. Year : 2012

programme.title: Kystvagten (10:68)
programme.desc: Australsk dramaserie.Narkosmugling, ulovligt fiskeri, menneskesmugling, ueksploderede miner og sågar terrorisme. Det er blot nogle af de problemer, der møder kaptajnløjtnant Mike Flynn og resten af besætningen på patruljebåden HMAS Hammersley, når de dagligt overvåger farvandet omkring Australiens kyster. Også blandt besætningen går bølgerne af og til højt. For det kan være sin sag at leve sammen i månedsvis på meget lidt plads. (t). Episode : 10:68. Genre : Serier. Year : 2007

programme.title: I farezonen (1:61)
programme.desc: Australsk dramaserie.I den australske storby Sydney sætter de ansatte ved politiets redningstjeneste gang på gang livet på spil for at redde andre, når de kaldes ud til alle tænkelige nødsituationer - fra trafikulykker til selvmordsforsøg. (t). Episode : 1:61. Genre : Serier. Year : 1996

programme.title: Under Hammeren
programme.desc: I Under Hammeren er alt på spil, når der rundt om i Danmark afholdes auktioner over alt fra blomster og kvæg til fine antikviteter og konkursboer. Hvem får solgt til prisen, og hvor langt er køberne egentlig villige til at gå. I dagens afsnit afholder Bruun Rasmussen et vurderingsarrangement i Marienlyst, som byder på mange spændende ting. Hos Dansk Maskinbørs i Herning sætter et beskedent fremmøde sit præg på priserne. Og hos Svendborg Auktionerne er stemningen høj, da der afholdes indboauktion. (t). Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2015

programme.title: Kender Du Typen? (5:8)
programme.desc: Kender Du Typen? besøger en kendt dansker, der har haft Thomas Helmig som bryllupsmusikant. Hvem er det mon, der gerne bruger 15.000 kroner på en taske, og som altid har Stryhns leverpostej i køleskabet? Det skal livsstilseksperterne Anne Glad og Christian Grau spore sig ind på i aftenens program, som begynder hos en af de mange heste, der bor i hovedpersonens baghave. Vært: Mads Steffensen. Sendt første gang 03.02.14 (t). Episode : 5:8. Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2014

programme.title: Hammerslag 2008 (9)
programme.desc: Hvad koster sommerhuse i det svage ejendomsmarked anno 2008, når nu de ligger i nogle af Danmarks bedste badebyer. Vi starter med et stort nybygget sommerhus på toppen af klitterne i Blokhus inden turen går til Løkken og et lille fritidshus i første række. To super lækre ejendomme, der dog blegner ved siden af aftenens sidste ejendom. Et 100 år gammelt sommerhus i bakkerne i Lønstrup. Her er der tale om ægte liebhaveri og det koster kassen. Sendt første gang 23.09.08 (t). Episode : 9. Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2008

programme.title: Ikke Okay (3:8)
programme.desc: Det nye program om moderne takt og tone. Værterne Hella Joof og Thomas Skov Gaardsvig forsøger at give gode råd, og i dette program gælder det alle de uskrevne regler, der er om børn og børneopdragelse. For hvad siger man egentlig, når man ser en grim baby? Hvordan kommer man af med børnenes rædselsfulde legekammerater? Og kan det virkeligt passe, at 2% af danskerne synes, at deres børn må bestemme, hvor de skal bo? (t). Episode : 3:8. Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2016

programme.title: De store katte (57)
programme.desc: Naturprogram fra BBC.Hvert år forlader 1,3 millioner gnuer deres hjem på Serengeti-sletten i Tanzania og vandrer 200 kilometer nordpå til Masai Mara. Det er det tidspunkt, alle kattene i Masai Mara har ventet på med længsel. Endelig kan de æde, til de revner. De mange byttedyr animerer dog til at prøve at dræbe flere, end man kan spise. Og leoparden Bella må sande, at det ikke altid kan betale sig. (t). Episode : 57. Genre : Natur & Miljø. Year : 1996

programme.title: Snohalebjørnen
programme.desc: Japansk naturprogram fra 2013.I en stor uberørt jungle i Pamana lever den storøjede snohalebjørn i træernes kroner 30 meter over jorden. Den er en slægtning af vaskebjørnen og ser sød ud. Om natten bevæger den sig behændigt fra gren til gren, og i den tørre sæson, hvor der ikke er flere af dens foretrukne figner, suger den nektar fra de hvide balsablomster. (t). Genre : Dokumentar. Year : 2013

programme.title: Under Hammeren
programme.desc: I Under Hammeren er alt på spil, når der rundt om i Danmark afholdes auktioner over alt fra blomster og kvæg til fine antikviteter og konkursboer. Hvem får solgt til prisen, og hvor langt er køberne egentlig villige til at gå. I dagens afsnit afholder York Auktion eftersyn, og det tiltrækker flere mennesker end ventet, så Ole må holde nerverne i ro med en gammel vane. Hos Bruun Rasmussen sælges en yderst sjælden Poul Kjærholm-daybed, som Liselotte Toxværd Møller har store forventninger til. programme.title: Kender Du Typen? (6:8)
programme.desc: Mads Steffensen er ikke specielt glad for fugle, men det er han nødt til at se stort på, da en umulig undulat truer med at ødelægge aftenens Kender Du Typen? Livsstilseksperterne Anne Glad og Christian Grau kommer trods fuglen gennem hjemmet og tager blandt andet stilling til, om hovedpersonen har et signeret foto af Abba, Monte Carlo-værterne fra P3 eller John Wayne hængende ved siden af toilettet. Vært: Mads Steffensen. Sendt første gang 10.02.14 (t). Episode : 6:8. Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2014

programme.title: Hammerslag 2008 (10)
programme.desc: Vi starter med en fantastisk ejendom midt i Hjørring. Huset ligger i en tidligere købmandsgård og ligner noget fra "Jul i Gammelby". Næste udfordring er en lystgård ved Tornby i Nordjylland. Gården har hestebokse, klitplantage, en sø med ørreder og alt er i en perfekt stand. Vi slutter i Skagen med et typisk skagenshus. Huset er lille, gult, har rødt tegltag og så er det, naturligvis, dyrt. Sendt første gang 30.09.08 (t). Episode : 10. Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2008

programme.title: Taggart: Begravelsesritualer (1:3)
programme.desc: Skotsk krimiserie fra 1987.Et forkullet lig bliver fundet i en jernbanetunnel. Den afdøde bliver identificeret som Douglas Abernathy - privatdetektiv, satanist og dømt for at have forbrudt sig mod mindreårige. Jim Taggart og hans nye makker Mike Jardine går på jagt efter morderen

programme.title: Taggart: Begravelsesritualer (2:3)
programme.desc: Skotsk krimiserie fra 1987.Taggart og hans unge makker Mike Jardine jager privatdetektiven og satanisten Douglas Abernathys morder. Abernathy efterforskede en sag om en 15-årig pige, der er forsvundet fra et kollektiv, hvor hun boede med sine forældre. Er der en sammenhæng? For at finde svaret bliver Jardine sendt undercover som kollektivets nye beboer

programme.title: Taggart: Begravelsesritualer (3:3)
programme.desc: Skotsk krimiserie fra 1987.Privatdetektiven Abernathy og graveren Conelly er fundet myrdet. Taggart og hans unge makker Jardine efterforsker sagen, der er mere end almindelig mystisk. For Abernathys fingeraftryk blev fundet på ragekniven, der dræbte Conelly - men Abernathy blev fundet død, før Conelly blev myrdet. Samtidig begynder Taggart at få mistanke om, at tandlægen Davidson er skyld i sin kones mange "uheld"

programme.title: Hamish Macbeth (9:20)
programme.desc: Skotsk krimiserie fra 1996.Isobel er frustreret over sine manglende karrieremuligheder som lokaljournalist, så hun lægger stilen om. Ny frisure, nyt tøj og nye hårdtslående metoder som journalist. Da den flotte Gary tilbyder sin hjælp, begynder hun hurtigt at nyde hans selskab - og den reaktion, som hendes nye venskab fremprovokerer hos Hamish. (t). Episode : 9:20. Genre : Serier. Year : 1995

Men en traumatisk fødsel rejser moralske spørgsmål for hende. (t). Episode : 6:10. Genre : Serier. Year : 2015

programme.title: Brdr. Madsens tidsrejse (8:8)
programme.desc: Hippietiden. Anders og Peter Lund Madsen er rejst ud i landet og tilbage i tiden for at prøve Danmarkshistorien på egen krop. De spiser, arbejder, bor, kæmper og fester som vi gjorde engang, for at finde ud af, hvad der har gjort os til de danskere vi er i dag. Tidsrejsen er ved vejs ende, og sidste stop er 1970'erne. En tid med opbrud og nybrud, viklebatik og mikromakromad. Og ikke mindst fed musik. Brødrene møder nogle af datidens koryfæer og husker deres egen opvækst i samme årti. Og så flytter de i kollektiv for at teste hinandens tolerance. (t). Episode : 8:8. Genre : Dokumentar. Year : 2016

programme.title: 7-9-13 III (3:4)
programme.desc: Dansk dokumentarserie fra 2016.Hvad vil det egentlig sige at være ægtepar i Danmark netop nu? Hvordan er det vi lever sammen i medgang og modgang. Livet er fuldt af skarpe hjørner. For Annika var det sværeste nogensinde, da hun frivilligt satte sine to store piger i familiepleje på grund af sit kokainmisbrug. Det er otte år siden, men da de to store piger er hjemme på besøg i Sydhavnen i sommerferien, fortæller de, at de gerne vil flytte hjem igen. I Albertslund fylder Torben til sin egen forbløffelse 60 år. Hos Ronni og Louise er den tidligere "Super-Karla" og mor til fem tvunget til at finde en ny rolle i familien. Hvem er hun nu, hvor hun er nødt til at sige fra overfor alt det hun klarede tidligere? (t). Episode : 3:4. Genre : Fritid & Livsstil. Year : 2016

programme.title: Børn i angstens greb (2:2)
programme.desc: Morten fra Tibirke og Freya fra Hillerød er begge 15 år. De har længe lidt af angst og risikerer at blive forfulgt af den resten af deres liv. Derfor har de og deres familier nu opsøgt hjælp. I et behandlingsforløb kaldet Cool Kids skal de lære nogle teknikker til at få styr på angsten

programme.title: Wallander: Blodets bånd
programme.desc: Svensk krimi fra 2005.I Ystads havn finder politiet en båd, der ligner en slagtehal indeni. Der er blod overalt, men intet lig. Senere driver en robåd med liget af en kvinde i land. Et af sporene fører til en god bekendt af Linda Wallander - nemlig hendes gamle flamme Oskar. Det får Lindas far, kommissær Wallander, til at kræve, at hun ikke blander sig i efterforskningen, men det er lettere sagt end gjort. For gammel kærlighed ruster aldrig. programme.title: De store katte - Bella og hendes ungers familiehistorie
programme.desc: Naturprogram fra BBC.Igennem flere år har vi fulgt de store kattes liv i det smukke Masai Mara i Kenya. På det 1500 kvadratkilometer store område lever 45 geparder, 100 leoparder og 500 løver side om side - og ikke altid lige fredeligt. Alles overlevelse er afhængig af en vellykket jagt, men jagtmetoderne er meget forskellige. (t)(n)

programme.title: Taggart: Med koldt blod
programme.desc: Skotsk krimi fra 1987.Ruth Wilson, direktør for et kosmetikfirma, står af toget, spadserer op til sin mands bil og skyder ham seks gange. Den simpleste sag, Jim Taggart har haft i månedsvis. Indtil det viser sig, at Ruth Wilsons mand allerede var død, da hun skød ham. Pludselig er sagen ikke længere så enkel.(n)

programme.title: Søren Ryge præsenterer: Far, mor og børn (3)

programme.desc: Er det et problem, når mere end 2 ud af 3 beboere i et udsat boligområde har ikke vestlig baggrund? Og hvordan slipper vi af med kriminaliteten og skaber mere tryghed? programme.title: Rosa fra Rouladegade III (3)
programme.desc: Agnes' honningviolin.Agnes på fem år kommer forbi Rosas hus og hjælper Rosa med at synge godnatsange om kager for sovedyrene. Forklædt som gartnere sniger de sig ind i Alexanders lejlighed for at finde ud af, hvad kagen skal smage af, og hvordan den skal se ud. programme.desc: Iben er 7 år og drømmer om at få akvarie-fisk. I dag får hun besøg af 8-årige Frederik, der ved alt om, hvordan man passer sådan nogle størrelser. Ibens mor og far kigger med og vurderer, om Iben måske er ved at være gammel nok til at få sin store drøm om et kæledyr opfyldt(n)
